content: this is a work in progress but i saw there was a need and tried to get this out quickly the pattern is included in this description and will make the hat shown in the photo blo - crochet in the back loop only c2tog - crochet two together sc2 - crochet two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch 3c - triple crochet i used worsted weight yarn and a 3 75 or f hook start with 3 single_crochet in a magic loop all rounds except r10 are in blo this helps minimize bulk r1 2sc in each stitch around 6 r2 ^single_crochet 2sc repeat from ^ around 9 r3 ^single_crochet 2x 2sc repeat from ^ around 12 r4 ^single_crochet 2x 2sc repeat from ^ around 16 r5 single_crochet around 16 r6 ^single_crochet 3x 2sc repeat from ^ around 20 r7 single_crochet around r8 ^single_crochet 4x 2sc repeat from ^ around 24 r9 ^c2tog single_crochet repeat from ^ around 16 r10 chain 3 3c around slip_stitch into chain 3 to complete tie off and weave in end leave starting end fold triple crochet row up to make the ribbing it won t be stretchy it s only for the look take one or two strands of yarn and feed through the top pointy bit of the hat so they are attached in the middle along with the starting tail braid loosely to desired length tie and cut the ends to form the tassel flatten and sew if desired or sew the ribbing down and add a safety pin to the back
